QuestData.Title: Bad at Breaking
QuestData.Description: Screams and growls echo from the canyon below - even more than usual.$b$bI don't dare leave Nisha here alone yet.$b$bWill you investigate those noises, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Iron Horde camp at Crushfang's End.
QuestData.RewardText: They are enslaving gronn? This is an even bigger problem than it might seem.
